item.title: Merry Christmas!
item.description: Christmas is the holiday about humility. The humility of the immortal and all powerful and all knowing stooping to become a mere human being. The humility of God and king to live among the humblest and poorest–a carpenter’s son. The humility of belonging to a race so broken that our Creator sent his only Son to redeem us. For me, the humblest part of this season is what I’m doing right now.
